REUTERS.UNKNOWN: V RM f1165 reute b f BC-/FED-SPOKESMAN-SAYS-N 04-24 0086

TEXT.TITLE: FED SPOKESMAN SAYS NO NEWS CONFERENCE PLANNED
TEXT.BODY: The Federal Reserve Board has no news conference or announcement planned for today, a Fed spokesman said, dispelling market rumors that a statement was pending. "No such event is scheduled or planned," said spokesman Bob Moore. Rumors of a pending Fed announcement or news conference circulated in financial markets, following a government report that consumer prices advanced by 0.4 pct in March, suggesting a rapid rise of inflation. Reuter
